00013 #ifndef VL_HOST_H
00014 #define VL_HOST_H
00015 
00016 /*
00017  The following macros identify the host OS, architecture and compiler.
00018  They are derived from http://predef.sourceforge.net/
00019  */
00020 
00023 #if defined(linux)     || \
00024     defined(__linux)   || \
00025     defined(__linux__) || \
00026     defined(__DOXYGEN__)
00027 #define VL_OS_LINUX 1
00028 #endif
00029 
00030 #if (defined(__APPLE__) & defined(__MACH__)) || \
00031      defined(__DOXYGEN__)
00032 #define VL_OS_MACOSX 1
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 #if defined(__WIN32__) || \
00036     defined(_WIN32)    || \
00037     defined(__DOXYGEN__)
00038 #define VL_OS_WIN 1
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 #if defined(_WIN64) || \
00042     defined(__DOXYGEN__)
00043 #define VL_OS_WIN64 1
00044 #endif
00045 
00049 #if defined(__GNUC__) || defined(__DOXYGEN__)
00050 # if defined(__GNUC_PATCHLEVEL__)
00051 #  define VL_COMPILER_GNUC (__GNUC__ * 10000 \
00052 + __GNUC_MINOR__ * 100 \
00053 + __GNUC_PATCHLEVEL__)
00054 # else
00055 #  define VL_COMPILER_GNUC (__GNUC__ * 10000 \
00056 + __GNUC_MINOR__ * 100)
00057 # endif
00058 #endif
00059 
00060 #if defined(_MSC_VER) || defined(__DOXYGEN__)
00061 #define VL_COMPILER_MSC _MSC_VER
00062 #endif
00063 
00064 #if defined(__LCC__) || defined(__DOXYGEN__)
00065 #warning "LCC support is experimental!"
00066 #define VL_COMPILER_LCC 1
00067 #endif
00068 
00073 #if defined(i386)     || \
00074     defined(__i386__) || \
00075     defined(__DOXYGEN__)
00076 #define VL_ARCH_IX86 300
00077 #elif defined(__i486__)
00078 #define VL_ARCH_IX86 400
00079 #elif defined(__i586__)
00080 #define VL_ARCH_IX86 500
00081 #elif defined(__i686__)
00082 #define VL_ARCH_IX86 600
00083 #elif defined(_M_IX86)
00084 #define VL_ARCH_IX86 _M_IX86
00085 #endif
00086 
00087 #if defined(_M_X64)    || \
00088     defined(__amd64__) || \
00089     defined(__amd64)   || \
00090     defined(__x86_64)  || \
00091     defined(__x86_64)
00092 #define VL_ARCH_X64
00093 #endif
00094 
00095 #if defined(__ia64__)   || \
00096     defined(_IA64)      || \
00097     defined(__IA64)     || \
00098     defined(__ia64)     || \
00099     defined(_M_IA64)    || \
00100     defined(__DOXYGEN__)
00101 #define VL_ARCH_IA64
00102 #endif
00103 
00107 #if defined(__LLP64__) || \
00108     defined(__LLP64)   || \
00109     defined(__LLP64)   || \
00110     (defined(VL_COMPILER_MSC) & defined(VL_OS_WIN64)) || \
00111     (defined(VL_COMPILER_LCC) & defined(VL_OS_WIN64)) || \
00112     defined(__DOXYGEN__)
00113 #define VL_COMPILER_LLP64
00114 #endif
00115 
00116 #if defined(__LP64__) || \
00117     defined(__LP64)   || \
00118     defined(__LP64)   || \
00119     (defined(VL_OS_MACOSX) & defined(VL_ARCH_IA64)) || \
00120     defined(__DOXYGEN__)
00121 #define VL_COMPILER_LP64
00122 #endif
00123 
00124 #if (!defined(VL_COMPILER_LLP64) & !defined(VL_COMPILER_LP64)) || \
00125     defined(__DOXYGEN__)
00126 #define VL_COMPILER_ILP32
00127 #endif
00128 
00132 #if defined(__LITTLE_ENDIAN__) || \
00133     defined(VL_ARCH_IX86)      || \
00134     defined(VL_ARCH_IA64)      || \
00135     defined(VL_ARCH_X68)       || \
00136     defined(__DOXYGEN__)
00137 #define VL_ARCH_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00138 #endif
00139 
00140 #if  defined(__DOXYGEN__) || \
00141     !defined(VL_ARCH_LITTLE_ENDIAN)
00142 #define VL_ARCH_BIG_ENDIAN
00143 #endif
00144 
00146 #if defined(VL_COMPILER_MSC)
00147 #define VL_INLINE static __inline
00148 #define snprintf _snprintf
00149 #define isnan _isnan
00150 #ifdef VL_BUILD_DLL
00151 #define VL_EXPORT __declspec(dllexport)
00152 #else
00153 #define VL_EXPORT __declspec(dllimport)
00154 #endif
00155 #endif
00156 
00157 #if defined(VL_COMPILER_LCC)
00158 #define VL_INLINE static __inline
00159 #define snprintf _snprintf
00160 #define isnan _isnan
00161 #ifdef VL_BUILD_DLL
00162 #define VL_EXPORT __declspec(dllexport)
00163 #else
00164 #define VL_EXPORT
00165 #endif
00166 #endif
00167 
00168 #if defined(VL_COMPILER_GNUC) || \
00169     defined(__DOXYGEN__)
00170 #define VL_INLINE static __inline__
00171 #ifdef VL_BUILD_DLL
00172 #define VL_EXPORT __attribute__((visibility ("default")))
00173 #else
00174 #define VL_EXPORT
00175 #endif
00176 #endif

00183 #define VL_TRUE 1   
00184 #define VL_FALSE 0  
00186 #if defined(VL_COMPILER_LP64) || defined(VL_COMPILER_LLP64)
00187 typedef long long           vl_int64 ;   
00188 typedef int                 vl_int32 ;   
00189 typedef short               vl_int16 ;   
00190 typedef char                vl_int8  ;   
00192 typedef long long unsigned  vl_uint64 ;  
00193 typedef int       unsigned  vl_uint32 ;  
00194 typedef short     unsigned  vl_uint16 ;  
00195 typedef char      unsigned  vl_uint8 ;   
00197 typedef int                 vl_int ;     
00198 typedef unsigned int        vl_uint ;    
00200 typedef int                 vl_bool ;    
00201 typedef vl_int64            vl_intptr ;  
00202 typedef vl_uint64           vl_uintptr ; 
00203 typedef vl_uint64           vl_size ;    
00204 typedef vl_int64            vl_index ;   
00205 typedef vl_uint64           vl_uindex ;  
00206 #endif

00290 VL_INLINE void vl_swap_host_big_endianness_8 (void *dst, void* src) ;
00291 VL_INLINE void vl_swap_host_big_endianness_4 (void *dst, void* src) ;
00292 VL_INLINE void vl_swap_host_big_endianness_2 (void *dst, void* src) ;
00298 VL_EXPORT void vl_print_host_info() ;
00299 VL_EXPORT vl_bool vl_cpu_has_sse3 () ;
00300 VL_EXPORT vl_bool vl_cpu_has_sse2 () ;

00304 VL_EXPORT vl_bool vl_get_simd_enabled() ;

00314 VL_INLINE void
00315 vl_swap_host_big_endianness_8 (void *dst, void* src)
00316 {
00317   char *dst_ = (char*) dst ;
00318   char *src_ = (char*) src ;
00319 #if defined(VL_ARCH_BIG_ENDIAN)
00320     dst_ [0] = src_ [0] ;
00321     dst_ [1] = src_ [1] ;
00322     dst_ [2] = src_ [2] ;
00323     dst_ [3] = src_ [3] ;
00324     dst_ [4] = src_ [4] ;
00325     dst_ [5] = src_ [5] ;
00326     dst_ [6] = src_ [6] ;
00327     dst_ [7] = src_ [7] ;
00328 #else
00329     dst_ [0] = src_ [7] ;
00330     dst_ [1] = src_ [6] ;
00331     dst_ [2] = src_ [5] ;
00332     dst_ [3] = src_ [4] ;
00333     dst_ [4] = src_ [3] ;
00334     dst_ [5] = src_ [2] ;
00335     dst_ [6] = src_ [1] ;
00336     dst_ [7] = src_ [0] ;
00337 #endif
00338 }
00339 
00348 VL_INLINE void
00349 vl_swap_host_big_endianness_4 (void *dst, void* src)
00350 {
00351   char *dst_ = (char*) dst ;
00352   char *src_ = (char*) src ;
00353 #if defined(VL_ARCH_BIG_ENDIAN)
00354     dst_ [0] = src_ [0] ;
00355     dst_ [1] = src_ [1] ;
00356     dst_ [2] = src_ [2] ;
00357     dst_ [3] = src_ [3] ;
00358 #else
00359     dst_ [0] = src_ [3] ;
00360     dst_ [1] = src_ [2] ;
00361     dst_ [2] = src_ [1] ;
00362     dst_ [3] = src_ [0] ;
00363 #endif
00364 }
00365 
00374 VL_INLINE void
00375 vl_swap_host_big_endianness_2 (void *dst, void* src)
00376 {
00377   char *dst_ = (char*) dst ;
00378   char *src_ = (char*) src ;
00379 #if defined(VL_ARCH_BIG_ENDIAN)
00380     dst_ [0] = src_ [0] ;
00381     dst_ [1] = src_ [1] ;
00382 #else
00383     dst_ [0] = src_ [1] ;
00384     dst_ [1] = src_ [0] ;
00385 #endif
00386 }
